signup.init: It seems like this is your first time here, we have automatically initialized your database.

dashboard.ongoing_surveys: There are no ongoing surveys now. | There is one ongoing survey. | There are {count} ongoing surveys.
dashboard.site_users: It looks like you're the only one here. | There are {count} users on your site.
dashboard.today_collected: We haven't collected any answer from your survey today. | We have collected an answer from your survey today. | We have collected {count} answers from your survey today.
dashboard.week_collected: We haven't collected any answer from your survey in this week. | We have collected an answer from your survey in this week. | We have collected {count} answers from your survey in this week.
dashboard.error_fetching_data: An error occurred while fetching data.

results.chart_unavailable: Sorry, the chart is currently not available.
results.survey_preview: The survey was created at {time}, has 1 answer. | The survey was created at {time}, has {count} answers.
results.question: Question

delete.warning_msg: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? All the questions and answers will be deleted. This action can't be undone.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting survey.

new.title: Title*
new.q1_sub: Choose a layout for your survey.
new.simple_sub: The simple survey contains only one question, user can answer without open a dialog window.
new.advanced_q_sub: Add a question to your advanced survey from here.
new.advanced_sub: The advanced survey can contain multiple questions, user need answer by opening a dialog window.
new.questions_list_sub: The list of questions in your advanced survey.
new.prompt_sub: The prompt only show message to user, user doesn't need to answer.

question.question: Question*
question.question_prompt_sub: Enter your prompt for question here.
question.answer_validate_unavailable: Sorry, The answer validate is currently not available for this type of question.
question.question_placeholder_sub: Enter your placeholder for question here.
question.prompt_title_sub: Enter your the title of your prompt here.
question.prompt_content_sub: Enter your the content of your prompt here.

new.domain_sub: Enter your domain here, separated by comma, leave blank for global.
new.position_sub: Choose the position for the prompt window.
new.error: An error occurred while creating survey.

files.specific_sub: Enter the file types you want to allow, leave blank for all.

new.webhook_sub: Enter your webhook url here, leave blank for none.

editUser.pwd: Password (Admin user please type your password)
editUser.enter_password: Please enter the new password for {username}.
editUser.enter_password_re: Please re-enter the new password for {username}.

settings.confirm_leave: Are you sure you want to leave this page? Your changes will not be saved.

view.requirements: The answer doesn't meet the requirements.
view.required_question: Please answer all the required questions.
view.requirements_submit: The answer doesn't meet the requirements. Please check it and try again.
view.wait_upload: Please wait for the file to upload.
view.went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

ai.unavailable: Sorry, the AI is currently not available.
ai.start: Try asking the AI some questions about this survey.
ai.no_apikey: You haven't set your OpenAI API Key yet. Please set it in the settings page.

footer.translate: The page was translated by Microsoft Translator and other contributors.
